1–2 real partner integrations (legal tech, HR, MCP, corporate LLM) for case studies and market trust.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- At least one partner/pilot documented: segment, what was integrated (API/SDK/sign-only), outcome (e.g. pilot: signed responses in workflow)
- Optional: case study template and one filled case study; link from README or Vision

См. `docs/en/PLAN_PHASE5.md` — 5.6, Task P5.6.1.
